title: Toby the Tram Engine
description: Four classic stories about Toby the Tram Engineâ€”the small wooden steam tram who runs a branch line and is a great friend of Thomas. Toby is the third most popular engine after Thomas and Percy!Toby is rescued from his East Anglian railway by the Fat Controller, and has a run-in with James.
author: W. Awdry
